title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Detection Engineering at Scale: Building High-Fidelity Security Operations-SEC327
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-大规模检测工程：构建高保真安全运营-SEC327
abstract: Security teams face an exponential growth in telemetry data across AWS services, third-party tools, and hybrid infrastructure. The challenge isn't just detecting threats—it's finding the real incidents among millions of daily events without overwhelming your SOC team. Join Riot games and Datadog subject matter experts as we explore battle-tested principles for building effective detection systems at scale. Drawing from real-world implementations at enterprises like Riot Games, we'll demonstrate how to leverage AWS native services alongside Datadog's security platform to create high-fidelity detection rules that actually work. This presentation is brought to you by Datadog, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 安全团队面临着AWS服务、第三方工具和混合基础设施中遥测数据的指数级增长。挑战不仅仅是检测威胁——而是在数百万日常事件中找到真正的安全事件，同时不让SOC团队不堪重负。加入Riot Games和Datadog主题专家，我们将探索在大规模环境下构建有效检测系统的实战原则。基于Riot Games等企业的真实实施经验，我们将演示如何利用AWS原生服务与Datadog安全平台相结合，创建真正有效的高保真检测规则。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Datadog为您呈现。
